title: FS: T206 HOF, Star Cards (5) - PSA
author: DerekMichael

posts.post_title: FS: T206 HOF, Star Cards (5) - PSA
posts.post_content:
Hi there T206 guys. 

I have a small batch of T206 available for sale, featuring a HOF, as well as four Star cards. All of the cards are pretty solid looking in my opinion, and they present nicely.

I am looking for $525 for the group if paid via paypal gift or by check. If you would like to pay via regular paypal, that is fine as well, but it will be your responsibility to cover the additional fees that paypal would take away from us. I will cover the cost of shipping. 

Thank you very much.

Derek

1.) Johnny Evers (portrait) ... Piedmont 150 ... PSA 2 ... hairline crease
2.) Ed Ruelbach (glove shows) ...Piedmont 150 ... PSA 3
3.) Doc White (portrait) ... Piedmont 350 ... PSA 4
4.) Chief Myers (fielding) ... Piedmont 350 ... PSA 3 ... very faint hairline crease
5.) Bill Carrigan ... Sweet Cap 350 f. 30 ... PSA 5

re bumping my previous bump ...

i would like to discuss a trade of these cards for some Southern League players. the technical grade is of no consequence to me, only the actual eye appeal of the card.

if anyone thinks they have a match, shoot me a pm and i would be happy to talk trade.

thank you.
